en.trash: Trash: You’ll find the bags in the kitchen. Close the bags well and take them to the bins in the courtyard before you leave. We separate waste (WeDoRecycling): please follow the instructions and do not leave garbage in the stairwell or outside the apartment door.
en.heating: Heating: Use the A/C remote. Press MODE until the sun symbol appears, set 26 °C and power level 1. Always switch off the A/C when you go out.
en.electric_panel: Electric panel: Going towards the bathroom, on the right (before the door) you will find the panel. If the power goes off: 1) raise any switch that is down; 2) if they are all already up, remove the panel above, raise the main switch and switch off some appliances.
en.wifi: Wi-Fi: The router is on the desk near the window. Turn it around to read the SSID and password on the label.
en.wifi_troubleshooting: Wi-Fi not working: 1) Check that the router is ON (front lights on). 2) Unplug the router for 30 seconds and plug it back in. 3) Make sure you are connected to the network shown on the label and that you entered the password exactly as written (uppercase/lowercase matters). If it still does not work, write to me and we will check together.
en.check_in:
Check-in: from 15:00.
Intercom: C8.
Main door: 08:00–13:00 and 15:30–18:00.
Concierge: Paolo.
Help: +39 335 5245756.
en.early_checkin: Early check-in: Standard check-in is from 15:00. If you need to arrive earlier, tell me the time you need and I will confirm if it’s possible based on same-day check-outs and the cleaning schedule.
en.check_out: Check-out: Before leaving, switch off lights and A/C, close the windows, leave the keys on the table and close the door gently.
en.late_checkout: Late check-out: Standard check-out time is 11:00. Sometimes we can allow a small extension, but it depends on same-day arrivals and the cleaning team. I cannot confirm it automatically: tell me the time you need and I will confirm based on availability.
en.water: Water: Tap water is safe to drink and normally hot water is always available. If in the shower or at the taps you only get cold water (or no water), turn the mixer fully to hot and let it run for 1–2 minutes. If it stays cold or there is no water, write to me immediately and tell me if the problem is only in the shower, at the sink or in the whole apartment, so we can check the boiler/water supply.
en.AC: A/C: Please switch off the air conditioning when you leave the apartment.
en.bathroom:
Bathroom: You will find toilet paper, hand soap, bath mat and hairdryer.
Towels: for each guest 1 large towel + 1 medium towel.
Bed: ready on arrival.
en.linens_towels:
Linens & towels: The bed is prepared on arrival and linens are provided.
Towels: for each guest 1 large towel + 1 medium towel.
en.gas: Gas use: Gas valve: horizontal = OPEN, vertical = CLOSED. Choose the burner, light a match/lighter, then turn and press the black knob until the flame is stable. When stable, release.
en.building:
Building: Intercom C8.
Elevator: reserved for owners — please do not use it.
Main door: 08:00–13:00 and 15:30–18:00.
Concierge: Paolo.
en.transport: Transport: Tram 8 (Arenula/Cairoli) → Trastevere or Piazza Venezia. Buses 40/64 → Termini and the Vatican. Taxi: +39 06 3570 or FreeNow app.
en.eat: Where to eat: Roscioli; Emma Pizzeria; Ditirambo; Osteria da Fortunata; Pianostrada; Forno Campo de’ Fiori; Gelateria del Teatro.
en.drink: Where to drink: Caffè Camerino (Largo Arenula 30); Irish Pub (Largo Argentina); Modius Radisson Rooftop.
en.visit: What to see: Largo di Torre Argentina; Portico d’Ottavia; Tiber Island; Piazza Farnese; hidden churches nearby.
en.experience: Experiences: Evening walk Largo Argentina → Ghetto → Tiber Island → Theatre of Marcellus; aperitivo at Camerino or Modius.
en.day_trips: Day trips: Ostia Antica; Tivoli (Villa d’Este and Hadrian’s Villa); Castelli Romani.
en.city_tax_info: City tax: In Rome it is mandatory for non-resident guests. For this apartment it is 5 € per person per night, up to a maximum of 10 nights.
en.city_tax_payment_issue: City tax payment issues: If the amount does not look correct or the link does not work, do not worry. Write to me and I will fix it.
en.payment_methods: Payments: The stay is usually paid via the booking platform. For city tax we use online payment links or cash if needed.
en.id_documents: ID documents: Italian law requires guest registration. I will ask for a valid ID document for each guest.
en.receipt_rental: Stay receipt: We can issue a simple receipt for the stay. Send me the details you need.
en.receipt_city_tax: City tax receipt: We can issue a separate receipt after payment.
en.house_rules: House rules: No parties, no loud music after 22:00, no smoking inside, no unregistered guests.
en.laundry: Laundry: If you need to wash clothes or towels, write to me and I will suggest the best option.
en.services: I did not find a direct answer. Try a quick button or send me a few more details.

it.trash: Spazzatura: Trovi le buste in cucina. Chiudi bene i sacchetti e portali nei cassonetti nella corte, prima dell’uscita. Facciamo raccolta differenziata (WeDoRecycling): segui le indicazioni e non lasciare immondizia nel vano scala o fuori dalla porta.
it.heating: Riscaldamento: Usa il telecomando dell’aria condizionata. Premi MODE finché appare il simbolo del sole, imposta 26 °C e potenza 1. Spegni sempre il condizionatore quando esci.
it.electric_panel: Quadro elettrico: Andando verso il bagno, sulla destra (prima della porta) trovi il quadro. Se manca la corrente: alza gli interruttori o riattiva il generale.
it.wifi: Wi-Fi: Il router è sulla scrivania vicino alla finestra. Giralo per leggere SSID e password sull’etichetta.
it.wifi_troubleshooting: Wi-Fi non funziona: controlla che il router sia acceso, riavvialo e verifica password. Se non va, scrivimi.
it.check_in:
Check-in: dalle 15:00.
Citofono: C8.
Portone: 08:00–13:00 e 15:30–18:00.
Portineria: Paolo.
it.early_checkin: Early check-in: Il check-in standard è dalle 15:00. Dimmi l’orario e ti confermo se possibile.
it.check_out: Check-out: Spegni luci e A/C, chiudi finestre, lascia le chiavi sul tavolo.
it.late_checkout: Late check-out: L’orario standard è alle 11:00. Posso verificare eventuali estensioni.
it.water: Acqua: L’acqua è potabile. Se esce fredda, lascia scorrere 1–2 minuti. Se il problema persiste, scrivimi.
it.AC: A/C: Spegni l’aria condizionata quando esci.
it.bathroom: Bagno: Carta igienica, sapone, tappetino e asciugacapelli disponibili.
it.linens_towels: Lenzuola e asciugamani: Letto pronto e biancheria inclusa.
it.gas: Uso gas: Valvola orizzontale = aperto, verticale = chiuso.
it.building: Edificio: Citofono C8. Ascensore riservato ai proprietari.
it.transport: Trasporti: Tram 8 → Trastevere o Piazza Venezia. Taxi +39 06 3570.
it.eat: Dove mangiare: Roscioli; Emma; Ditirambo; Fortunata.
it.drink: Dove bere: Camerino; Irish Pub; Modius.
it.visit: Cosa vedere: Torre Argentina; Portico d’Ottavia; Isola Tiberina.
it.experience: Esperienze: Passeggiata serale Ghetto e Isola Tiberina.
it.day_trips: Gite: Ostia Antica; Tivoli; Castelli Romani.
it.city_tax_info: Tassa di soggiorno: 5 € a persona per notte, max 10 notti.
it.payment_methods: Pagamenti: Soggiorno via piattaforma, tassa con link o contanti.
it.id_documents: Documenti: Servono per la registrazione obbligatoria.
it.receipt_rental: Ricevuta soggiorno: Posso emetterla su richiesta.
it.house_rules: Regole: No feste, no rumori dopo le 22:00, no fumare.
it.services: Non ho trovato una risposta diretta. Scrivimi più dettagli.

fr.trash: Poubelles : Vous trouverez les sacs dans la cuisine. Fermez-les bien et déposez-les dans les conteneurs de la cour avant de sortir.
fr.heating: Chauffage : Utilisez la télécommande de la climatisation. MODE → symbole du soleil → 26 °C.
fr.electric_panel: Tableau électrique : Sur le chemin de la salle de bain, à droite. En cas de coupure, remontez les disjoncteurs.
fr.wifi: Wi-Fi : Le routeur est sur le bureau près de la fenêtre. SSID et mot de passe sont sur l’étiquette.
fr.wifi_troubleshooting: Wi-Fi ne fonctionne pas : vérifiez que le routeur est allumé, redémarrez-le et contrôlez le mot de passe.
fr.check_in:
Arrivée : à partir de 15:00.
Interphone : C8.
fr.early_checkin: Arrivée anticipée : Dites-moi l’heure souhaitée et je vérifierai la disponibilité.
fr.check_out: Départ : Éteignez lumières et climatisation, fermez les fenêtres et laissez les clés sur la table.
fr.late_checkout: Départ tardif : L’heure standard est 11:00. Je peux vérifier une éventuelle extension.
fr.water: Eau : Potable. Si l’eau est froide, laissez couler 1–2 minutes. Sinon, écrivez-moi.
fr.AC: Climatisation : Merci de l’éteindre en sortant.
fr.bathroom: Salle de bain : Papier toilette, savon, tapis et sèche-cheveux fournis.
fr.linens_towels: Draps et serviettes : Lit prêt à l’arrivée.
fr.gas: Gaz : Vanne horizontale = ouverte, verticale = fermée.
fr.building: Immeuble : Interphone C8. Ascenseur réservé aux propriétaires.
fr.transport: Transports : Tram 8 → Trastevere ou Piazza Venezia.
fr.eat: Où manger : Roscioli, Emma, Ditirambo, Fortunata.
fr.drink: Où boire : Camerino, Irish Pub, Modius.
fr.visit: À voir : Torre Argentina, Portique d’Octavie, Île Tibérine.
fr.experience: Expériences : Promenade du soir dans le Ghetto et l’Île Tibérine.
fr.day_trips: Excursions : Ostia Antica, Tivoli, Castelli Romani.
fr.city_tax_info: Taxe de séjour : 5 € par personne et par nuit.
fr.city_tax_payment_issue: Problème de taxe : écrivez-moi et je corrige.
fr.payment_methods: Paiements : Séjour via plateforme, taxe via lien ou espèces.
fr.receipt_rental: Reçu de séjour : disponible sur demande.
fr.house_rules: Règles : pas de fêtes, pas de bruit après 22:00, non-fumeur.
fr.services: Je n’ai pas trouvé de réponse directe. Donnez plus de détails.

de.trash: Müll: Beutel in der Küche. Bitte gut verschließen und in den Hof bringen.
de.electric_panel: Sicherungskasten: Rechts vor dem Bad. Bei Stromausfall Sicherungen hochlegen.
de.wifi: WLAN: Router auf dem Schreibtisch, Daten auf dem Etikett.
de.wifi_troubleshooting: WLAN funktioniert nicht: Router prüfen, neu starten, Passwort kontrollieren.
de.early_checkin: Früher Check-in: Uhrzeit mitteilen, ich prüfe die Möglichkeit.
de.check_out: Check-out: Licht und Klimaanlage aus, Fenster schließen, Schlüssel auf den Tisch.
de.late_checkout: Später Check-out: Standard 11:00. Verlängerung auf Anfrage.
de.water: Wasser: Trinkbar. Bei kaltem Wasser 1–2 Minuten laufen lassen.
de.bathroom: Bad: Toilettenpapier, Seife, Badematte und Föhn vorhanden.
de.linens_towels: Bettwäsche & Handtücher: Bett bei Ankunft vorbereitet.
de.gas: Gas: Ventil waagrecht = offen, senkrecht = zu.
de.building: Gebäude: Sprechanlage C8. Aufzug nur für Eigentümer.
de.transport: Verkehr: Tram 8 → Trastevere oder Piazza Venezia.
de.visit: Sehenswertes: Torre Argentina, Portico d’Ottavia, Tiberinsel.
de.day_trips: Ausflüge: Ostia Antica, Tivoli, Castelli Romani.
de.payment_methods: Zahlungen: Aufenthalt über Plattform, Kurtaxe per Link oder bar.
de.house_rules: Hausordnung: keine Partys, Ruhe nach 22:00, Rauchverbot.
de.laundry: Wäsche: Schreiben Sie mir für Tipps.
de.services: Keine direkte Antwort gefunden. Bitte mehr Details.

es.trash: Basura: Bolsas en la cocina. Ciérrelas bien y llévelas al patio.
es.heating: Calefacción: Mando del A/C → MODE → sol → 26 °C.
es.electric_panel: Cuadro eléctrico: A la derecha antes del baño. Suba los interruptores.
es.wifi: Wi-Fi: Router en el escritorio, datos en la etiqueta.
es.wifi_troubleshooting: Wi-Fi no funciona: revise el router, reinícielo y verifique la contraseña.
es.early_checkin: Check-in temprano: Dígame la hora y lo verifico.
es.check_out: Check-out: Apague luces y A/C, cierre ventanas, deje las llaves.
es.late_checkout: Salida tardía: Hora estándar 11:00. A consultar.
es.water: Agua: Potable. Si sale fría, deje correr 1–2 minutos.
es.bathroom: Baño: Papel higiénico, jabón, alfombrilla y secador.
es.linens_towels: Sábanas y toallas: Cama lista a la llegada.
es.gas: Gas: Válvula horizontal = abierta, vertical = cerrada.
es.building: Edificio: Interfono C8. Ascensor solo propietarios.
es.transport: Transporte: Tranvía 8 → Trastevere o Piazza Venezia.
es.eat: Dónde comer: Roscioli, Emma, Ditirambo, Fortunata.
es.drink: Dónde beber: Camerino, Irish Pub, Modius.
es.visit: Qué ver: Torre Argentina, Pórtico de Octavia, Isla Tiberina.
es.experience: Experiencias: Paseo nocturno por el Gueto.
es.day_trips: Excursiones: Ostia Antica, Tivoli, Castelli Romani.
es.city_tax_info: Tasa turística: 5 € por persona y noche.
es.payment_methods: Pagos: Estancia por plataforma, tasa por enlace o efectivo.
es.receipt_city_tax: Recibo de tasa: tras el pago.
es.house_rules: Normas: sin fiestas, silencio después de las 22:00, no fumar.
es.services: No encontré respuesta directa. Indique más detalles.
